--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...> wrote:

> This is specific to session beans, but you can also use it for 
> message-driven beans and BMP entity beans; only CMP entity beans 
> really need to be tested entirely in an EJB container.

The general consensus among The Smart People seems to be that entity
beans are a bad idea.  Why are you using them?  Have you considered
alternatives?

Dave
